plham

Class Fundamentals

  • plham.Fundamentals

  • public class Fundamentals
    A class for fundamental values of multiple markets (assets). This can generate multivariate geometric Brownian motion.

    • Field Summary

      MultiGeomBrownian g
      Map<String,Long> table
